objective: Implement JSON CLI tool using Click framework with schema validation capabilities
single_responsibility: Build functional CLI foundation with validation core

constraints.package_manager: UV only - no pip, poetry, conda
constraints.framework: Click for CLI (not argparse or typer)

implementation_specs.error_handling: Custom exceptions inheriting from base Exception

code_patterns.validation_core:
import jsonschema
from jsonschema import validate, ValidationError

success_criteria: CLI accepts JSON file and optional schema arguments
jsonschema library validates JSON against schema
Clear error messages for validation failures
Type hints on all functions and methods
UV can install and run the package
focus_directive: Implement only the core CLI and validation - no tests, no docs, no extras
